oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Catholic Hour - 1948-04-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC program The Catholic Hour, originally broadcast April 25, 1948, part 1. With an address by Father Benjamin L. Massey, and the Choir of the Sulpician Seminary under the direction of Father John J. Castelot.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Choir of the Sulpician Seminary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Announcer opening statement -- Announcer introduces the choir -- Hymn Of St Patrick (Choir of the Sulpician Seminary) -- Announcer introduces Father Benjamin L. Massey -- Address by Benjamin L. Massey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Catholic hour (Radio program)
